system.description: You create a passage through wooden, plaster, or stone walls, but not through metal or other harder materials. The passage is 5 feet wide, 8 feet high, and 10 feet deep per caster level. The passage closes after 1 hour; other creatures can use it before then. When the spell ends, creatures in the passage are ejected to the nearest open space.
system.target: 5-ft.-wide by 8-ft.-high by 10-ft.-deep opening in 1 ft. of wood, plaster, or stone
